```css
// Property: modalStyle
// Description: Presentation style of this modal window.
// Component(s): openWindowParams
'.modal-style-presentation-current-context[platform=ios]': { modalStyle: Ti.UI.iOS.MODAL_PRESENTATION_CURRENT_CONTEXT }
'.modal-style-presentation-over-current-context[platform=ios]': { modalStyle: Ti.UI.iOS.MODAL_PRESENTATION_OVER_CURRENT_CONTEXT }
'.modal-style-presentation-over-current-full-screen[platform=ios]': { modalStyle: Ti.UI.iOS.MODAL_PRESENTATION_OVER_CURRENT_FULL_SCREEN }
'.modal-style-presentation-formsheet[platform=ios]': { modalStyle: Ti.UI.iOS.MODAL_PRESENTATION_FORMSHEET }
'.modal-style-presentation-fullscreen[platform=ios]': { modalStyle: Ti.UI.iOS.MODAL_PRESENTATION_FULLSCREEN }
'.modal-style-presentation-pagesheet[platform=ios]': { modalStyle: Ti.UI.iOS.MODAL_PRESENTATION_PAGESHEET }
```
